Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Load, aim, fire. Guns have always been this simple and practical.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'The guns you have on display makes me think you feel the same way too.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '...Thanks for your hard work. If you have any problems with guns, you can come to me to have them fixed anytime.', 4: '1'}
